column4: 7.10 should have it set up already (maybe unless you upgraded).... but just install cups-pdf, go to system > admin >printing, and you can add a pdf printer
did you completely miss my answer before ?
7.10 should have it set up already (maybe unless you upgraded).... but just install cups-pdf, go to system > admin >printing, and you can add a pdf printer
Yar I think so, and thanks
